```{r}
#| message: false
# Read and format data
resources <- readr::read_csv("resources.csv") |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    Link = kableExtra::cell_spec(
      stringr::str_remove_all(Link, "https://|/$"),
      format = "html",
      link = Link
    )
  )

# Function to make table
resources_table <- function(Category, data = resources) {
  output <- data |>
    dplyr::filter(Type == Category) |>
    dplyr::select(-Type) |>
    dplyr::arrange(Title) |>
    knitr::kable("html", escape = FALSE, col.names = NULL) |>
    kableExtra::column_spec(
      column = 1,
      width = "35%",
      bold = TRUE, border_right = TRUE
    ) |>
    kableExtra::column_spec(
      column = 2,
      width = "65%"
    )
  return(output)
}
```


# Blogs

```{r}
resources_table("Blog")
```
